data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Bankura, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bankura, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Bankura, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Bankura, West Bengal, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Bankura, West Bengal, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Dangi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Bankura, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Bankura to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bankura, West Bengal, India has a population of 3,596,700.

We estimate Bankura has 39,564 people who might know Jesus, 43,640 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,513,496 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Bankura unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Bankura
location.people_groups_list: Puran Bhaja, Sounti, Desua Bhumij, Patial, Yadav Bagal
